评论详情: I have these shorts in two colors. This teal color and a navy. I bought them in two sizes as well. I prefer the large over the medium, but the medium works fine as well. Super cute to wear with a T-shirt and cute shoes for a more casual day or for a workout or hike. Great quality and value for money. They’re super flowy and I like the wide waistband. It’s not too constricting and is comfortable.

I’m a new SAHM and these are great for chasing two rowdy boys. They’re so light, comfortable, cute, and flattering. I bought them in 5 colors for each weekday (I’m not crazy). The waistband holds you in but without being too tight and leaving marks if that makes sense and I have some postpartum weight still going on. The length is not too short but also not old mom ish if that makes sense. I have trouble with some shorts in the thigh area (athletic build) and these don’t ride up. If they do the skirt flap hides it well and makes me feel more covered up than just wearing shorts. Feminine and sporty vibes. The colors are so pretty and they wash well. I always get spit up on me and the oil stain from that washes out. If it’s a lot I’ll rub a stain stick on it and it does the trick. My husband might be upset if I order more so unfortunately I’ll wait until Christmas to ask for more haha

These look like a skirt in front and shorts in back. Perfect for tennis with built in undershorts too.  It is loose and flattering.  I like my tennis skirts short and this hits at a nice length.  Material is soft and flows. 10/10 for me

These are the comfiest workout shorts I have ever owned. They are super soft and the design is flattering. They stay put regardless of the movement I’m doing (whether it’s exercising or playing with my kids). The colors are as seen online and the material is lightweight, but not see through. I love that they have pockets too. Great for working out or just day to day wear. I think these shorts and the Crz Yoga brand are worth the money!

So cute and very flattering! High waisted and not too short. I am 5’1 and 140 lbs and got a large. I could have done a medium - in some areas it’s a little loose but i’m happy with the large! When I was walking on the treadmill, since they are a tad oversized it felt like they were giving me a wedgie BUT overall 4.5 stars. Did pilates and cycling in them and they were great, very light and airy.
Love these shorts. They are high waisted to cover stomach. You can wear them for workout or dress them up with a graphic tee.

I am a 52 year old fitness fanatic.  I am always looking for cute and comfortable shorts to workout in or to wear on the days I am running around doing errands.  These shorts fit all my needs.  They have true coverage in the front and the back and they hang in the most flattering way.  My 24 year old daughter saw me in them and immediately ordered two for herself in fun colors.  They run true to size and are at a great price point!  I have only had them for a few weeks, but they seem to wash well and maintain their shape!  I truly love these shorts and this entire brand!

This skirt is perfect if you like wearing athletic wear but want to dress it up a little bit. I work from home and live for comfy cloths and this allows me to feel comfortable and stylish rather than just wearing my biker shorts or regular workout shorts. I am 5’7” and ordered a medium and the length and fit is perfect. The skirt sits just below my bellybutton. I could pull it up more for a more high waisted fit but I would then risk it being uncomfortable if you know what I mean. Overall I would recommend this skirt, I also have one in black!

I have two of these and use them for hybrid racing competitions (running and lifting) and they work great.  They do not get caught in the rower and allow great freedom of movement.  I also love that the pocket zips so you can keep a gel of gummies handy.

This brand I found out is a Hanes brand. And they are a dupe for lulu and athleta at a fraction of the price. These do run a tad big I would size down. Got these with a matching top getting ready for spring using as a swimming suit kind of set.
Perfect skort for school and movement! Must buy!

评论概述: Feel great but sweat is super obvious
评论详情: These skorts are SO comfortable and cute - super airy and you forget you're wearing them, but I noticed in a video of myself that sweat spots look super obvious and it's not very flattering. :/ I'm not sure if it's just the color that I got (teal) or if that's just the case of the type of material. Otherwise I would give it 5 stars!
this is a very cute skirt, just not on me. My friend bought one and looks so cute in it, but I think she must have sized up. For my age I need one that covers a little more in the back.

评论概述: Not tall girl / big booty friendly
评论详情: Love the color and material of these shorts. They do remind me of Lululemon! However, if you’re tall or have a big booty, they don’t really fit well. Even with sizing up, these exposed too much skin because of the length / slit on the side. I had to return them.
love this skirt, I get so many compliments
This has been my go to all summer. It's flattering in the front and back. true to size, washed well and versatile. I ordered in black and green
I liked this so much I bought another one! Very flattering and light weight!
I have these in 3 colors and get so many compliments on them. All of my friends have now ordered them as well. I’m 5’7, 149 lb and Medium is perfect for me.
The first thing I have felt good in since having a baby! The only downfall is it only has one, very small pocket with a zipper.

I am loving this skirt right now! It is so comfortable and breathable! It isn’t see through and doesn’t ride up when wearing. It is a good length and fits true to size. What I love most is that it’s lightweight and airy! I will be purchasing in more colors!
Bought these for my granddaughter. Fit was perfect and they look so cute.
These are really cute and I can wear them casually.  But they do ride up in the back so I can’t wear running or for events that entail lots of walking.  I’m 5’6” and 150lbs.  I bought a medium.
Cut is so flattering on many body types. My most worn piece of athletic clothing by far

评论概述: Soooo cute! Size up 1 for comfy fit
评论详情: This skirt is so cute!! I got the bright orange and the first time I wore it I got so many compliments. I would usually wear a small but I sized up to a medium and I’m glad I did. There’s nothing worse than when a skirt that has the scrunchy waistband or built in underwear is too tight. It doesn’t look big it’s just comfier than my true size would’ve been

I wanted to love this because everything about it was perfect besides the length on me! Great quality, fun colors, comfy, so versatile to dress up a little or more casual but I’m 5’8” and the small was too short for me personally. Great price and so bad wish I could have kept this!
Tad large. Front it definitely free flowing

These shorts are super cute! I love the skirt front and short back. They don’t have built in undies if that’s something you prefer. I am generally a s/m. I ordered a small and they fit great with good stretch.
I was a bit surprised with how short this skort is, and it rides up quite a bit. The waist band, though comfy, makes up about 1/3 of the length, which I think makes it look weird on

评论用户: Mary Hollis Callaway Langel/ The Callaway Collection
评论详情: The CRZ YOGA Athletic Shorts with the high-waisted, flowy ruffle skirt overlay are amazing! They’re perfect for running and workouts, offering both style and comfort. The fit is great, and the ruffle detail adds a fun touch. I highly recommend to anyone looking to combine function and fashion in their activewear!
Very cute! Fit well! Material see through in back.

I really love these shorts. I have worn them so much this summer and I’m buying all the colors. The waist band holds in my postpartum tummy, they are very flattering. I’m usually a large, they fit great but bought the XL for my next pair and I like the way that fits a little better. Just slightly more comfortable and a little bit longer so they don’t ride up. Even with that being said, highly recommend these!
I am 5’5” 140 lbs and the medium fit perfectly. The band is stretchy, stays up but isn’t too tight- so comfortable. Bought the light purple and the color is so pretty! I want a pair in every color.

I’m a big CRZ Yoga girlie and find their line never misses when it comes to style and value.  This was a 5 star for me all the way.  From the extra large waist band that’s def giving FP, to the flowy skirt front and extra roomy shorts, I’ve already ordered two more colors.  I’m 5’11” and can wear an XS or S in CRZ, for these I went with the S, But could have easily sized down. So I’d say they may run a smidge big.  Even with my long legs I don’t feel like they’re too short and the liner never felt constricting.  Love these!

I’ve tried all the high-end shorts/skorts searching for a pair that’s actually high-waisted on my long torso — and that don’t dig in and give me the dreaded bulge at the belly. These don’t do either! The wide waist band is really flattering on my soft mom tummy, and they are comfy and cute. I’m excited to finally have a skort that can pair with my crop tops in the summer. These come right to the bottom of my Align tops. I’m a 28 in jeans and medium fits great. Just wish there was a matching bra or top in the lip gloss pink color!

This is a super cute skort and very flattering. I love the high / thick waste band and length of this product. The fabric was also a nice feel and as always, a great price from this company. I decided to return bc I did not love the skirt look in front and shorts in the back. It was not for me. But it was a close call.
Great shorts! Very flattering and comfortable. Material is light weight and soft. I will be ordering them in black too!
I absolutely love this skort. It’s comfy and fits in all the right places. This colour is just beautiful too
SO comfortable, fabric is so lightweight and the pockets are the icing on the cake! My daughters and I love these so much that together we now have over 15 pairs in every color of the rainbow!
These are comfortable; however, they do feel a little cheap. I like the way the look with a swimsuit.

评论概述: A tad short for any cellulte girlies
评论详情: Love the concept and the fabric, but wish it were a tad longer on the sides to conceal the cellulite on my legs.

Bought this to pair with a cute tee to feel more dressed up and I’m so glad I did. The inner lining does not ride up and the skort is super lightweight, without being see through - the lining is very comfortable and the fabric is breathable. I love the brightness of this color and plan on getting more! So cute!
These are so comfortable and light. The fit is nice and there is stretch. I wore them in Florida in August and they were perfect.
I really like these for anything and all things really. Cute and comfortable! They flatter the bum and aren’t too revealing, which as a mom, I appreciate.

This skort will FORVER have my heart!!🤍 it is the most comfortable skirt/ shorts I've ever worn!! I have them on in the color black in a size medium I am 133lbs and 5"6. I could have done the small but I prefer a loose flowy fit in my shorts! They don't ride up when working out, they suck in that lower belly area giving you a SNATCHED waist!! If you snag them let me know!!
I wish I owned these in every color! Absolutely perfect. You can dress up or down. I love that I can style w a cute sweater for school pick up or drop off and then delayer for a workout. Obsessed.
Bought these specifically for Disney World and they were great. Fit great and super comfortable.
I am normally a M in CRZ yoga shorts but I sized up to a L in this skirt and it fits well !! Light weight good for summer. VERY comfortable- super cute!

I love these so much I bought them in a second color. Looks like a skirt in the front and shorts in the back. Perfect for exercise or running errands. Flattering fit, covers the booty and stylish. Been wearing them all summer! High waist is great too!
These have been my go-to shorts for summer. Comfortable and breathable. They are on the shorter size but waist fits true to size.
Great skort! Not too thick, not too thin. Great color and versatile. Doesn’t ride up, band it nice and thick, stretchy and comfortable. Would buy in multiple colors.
I wear these almost every day! They stay put with the thick waist band, and it’s easy to tuck in or leave shirts “out”

I'm 5'7" and bought this in an XS. Fit is TTS, waist was perfect and super flattering honestly. Only complaint is the length for me was a little too short, so I returned. Other than that I really loved everything about it. The Borealis Green color is gorgeous and now that its back in stock I may try ordering a size up to a S and see if that gives me a little more length. If you are shorter than me though go with your usual size and don't hesitate!

Wore this on vacation in hot, humid weather, and still felt very comfortable. Didn’t ride up or stick to my legs. Also, it is very flattering! I ordered a large instead of my normal medium just for a little wiggle room and I loved the fit! Will be ordering in other colors!
Love these! They are super lightweight and not too snug in the underwear region or the waist. Sometimes these waist bands can suffocate you but these feel like I’m not wearing anything!
So comfortable and cute! The material is super soft and it doesn’t cut in! Will purchase in other colors!
I love these shorts. They are very cute and very comfortable. As they don’t have pockets it’s OK because I typically wear them not needing a pocket. Would highly recommend.

评论概述: Better Than Expected In Every Way!!!
评论详情: I have worked in fitness for 25 years and am super picky about my athletic and athleisure wear. I have never bought clothes from Amazon until a client turned me on to these AWESOME skorts. I am 5' 4" and weight 128# and the size small is perfect, true to size, the inner short isn't restrictive or too loose, the fabric is soft and light, and it has enough coverage for modesty while still being short and sassy. I will definitely be buying more.
I LOVE these shorts that look like a skirt in the front. The white are great for my tan skin. The elasticity is great on my waist as well.

Love love love! I can’t rave about these enough! I and 5’11 with an athletic build, which includes very muscular thighs. I typically have to size up in shorts,  but I wear a true medium in these! They have more leg room than most.
I have about 6-7 colors I love them so much. So comfortable.
The best shorts I own! I have a smaller waist, thick thighs and a booty and these shorts have great coverage and flow in all the right areas! The extra layer in the front is perfection.
LOVE this! I get compliments every time I wear it! True to size! I got a M and I am a true size 8. Be athletic and cute at same time!!

I practically live in Athleisure, so when I say i’m obsessed with this skort I absolutely mean it. The skirt adds a bit of a flare to just regular running shorts so you can wear it to work out but also for getting dressy! I’m training for a race as well so the side pocket is amazing to hold energy gels. The material is so comfy and is high waisted.  I honestly want one in every color. Lol

评论概述: I an crazy about these shorts
评论详情: ended up ordering another pair in black- LOVE THESE SHORTS!

评论概述: Size medium for reference, this is the grey.

评论详情: Bought this for a little bit more put together look but was also still able to run and workout in it as well. Fit was great, I sized up as I normally do in shorts but could have done my regular size
I use these as a swim suit bottom and they work great! Very cute, very comfortable for this purpose
I love them ! so so comfortable , very flattering, I'm definitely getting another color of them.
Favorite shorts I’ve ever worn! Fit great, I’ve ordered in multiple colors
Give me these in EVERY. SINGLE. COLOR. I tried these in both the small and medium. Both sizes fit, but I prefer the medium. I’d say size up if you’re in between or want a more comfortable fit.

评论概述: Want to wear it every day
评论详情: I have this in two colors already, and I’ll be buying more at some point. It’s my go-to. So comfortable and cute. Great value. Highly recommend!
Fits very true to size! Very stretchy, lightweight and great quality. 5,1”, 114lbs and smalls are perfect.

This CRZ YOGA skort is a real find—feels like it could hang with the big-name brands but without hitting your wallet as hard. Since snagging it last week, I've already worn it multiple times and am loving the fit. It's comfy, true to size, and adds a touch of feminine flair to my athletic looks. The black color is rich and hasn't faded a bit, making it a stellar choice for anyone looking to spice up their workout wardrobe.

评论概述: Will be wearing this all summer
评论详情: I absolutely love this skort! It was recommended by an influencer so I didn’t have high expectations, but I was pleasantly surprised. I bought it in 4 colors and it will be a staple in my summer wardrobe. As a busy mom, I don’t have much time to get ready for the day. These are so easy and look put together. I wear them in the golf course too.

Love this skort! Purchased the lime green one in January for a trip and have been waiting for more spring/ summer colors!! Just purchased 2 more! Love these for errands, kids games, and I often use as a swim skirt! Not too short, not tight around the waist so looks so flattering even with a bikini top on. Get lots of compliments whenever I wear them!!
I can’t begin to say enough good things about the Short. I have them in two colors and rotate them out every day..

Me entire outfit today was CRZA yoga! Sports bra, tank, and skort. Amazing quality items for an affordable price. Extremely comfortable. Pocket for phone with a zipper! The color matched the description. The skort doesn’t ride up at all. The fabric is not transparent!
Almost perfect but a little in the thin side for light colors. Still love it though!
Love this skort, and the waistband is soft so even though it’s thick it doesn’t pinch like some of the other free people dupes
Super cute! Quality was there I did size down! Runs big in my opinion

I love this skort and get so many compliments every time I wear it. I am 5'2" and 120 lbs and I believe it runs true to size, if not slightly big. I typically wear a medium in this brand, but could have probably gone with a small. The fabric does get a bit wrinkled, but I did hang dry it so that could be the cause of the wrinkles. Nothing a quick swipe of the iron can't take care of. I did wear the skort to play tennis, which was a bit challenging as the one pocket is not large enough to fit the ball, but I was able to slip it in the built in underwear...did make it a little tricky to retrieve the ball, but it worked!
I’m 5’7, 130lbs and I got the XS in two colors and I live in them. Highly recommend, very comfortable and great quality!!

Seriously this skort is so dang cute. Do not hesitate and just buy it. Totally gives off Lululemon and Free People vibes! Entire outfit is from the brand and I’m a bougie h*e who loves name brand stuff but I’ll definitely be back for more! 5’4 - 110lbs - athletic build and the XXS was perfect!
These shorts are a must have! I bought several colors and I wear them all the time! Highly recommend! True to size

评论概述: Comfy, cute, and does NOT ride up
评论详情: I’m obsessed with these! It’s very nice quality and super comfy. They feel like the og nike shorts but look a lot cuter and the skirt thing in the front is the cherry on top! Also if you’re in college and have issues with your shorts riding up because of your backpack, then these are perfect! Will be buying in every color🫶🏻
Comfy, fits perfect.
I will be ordering these in more colors! As a middle-aged mom, I find it hard to buy things my teens approve of, but this was one!
These are the best shorts and so flattering.  They fit true to size.  I love how they fit in the waist.  I will definitely be buying more colors!

I love the teal color. The high waisted thick band is perfect for this mama for summer! They are SOOO comfortable and will be perfect for dressing up or dressing down. I will absolutely be buying more of these shorts!
Lightweight and flattering
i personally sized up for length but so cute and definitely able to style many ways
My favorite activewear!! So soft, comfortable, and cute!

评论概述: Way too short for curvy women
评论详情: I even sized up to an XL and the skort was too short for me, I am 5'11" 185lbs and curvy.  I wish it had at least 2 more inches of fabric.  Love the color and it fit great, but too short for me.
exactly like the expensive ones, half the price
Great fit and love the flow of the material
Love this skort. Perfect for busy moms or errands. Sports too!
Love these and have them in two more colors! 6 foot tall about 180lbs
So glad I got this! Its soft! I’m 5’1, 120lb and got a medium but will be ordering a small for a better fit.
The fit & color are amazing! I received numerous complaints everytime I wear them. Highly recommend!
This is the best skort I have ever worn 135 pounds got the medium and it fits great will be buying more colors
